# Magic Fang, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[Bestial (Domain)|Bestial 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 309

This spell functions like *[[Magic Fang (Spell)|magic fang]]*, except that the enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls is +1 per four caster levels (maximum +5). This bonus does not allow a natural weapon or unarmed strike to bypass damage reduction aside from magic.

Alternatively, you may imbue all of the creatureâ€™s natural weapons with a +1 enhancement bonus (regardless of your caster level).

*Greater magic fang* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
